text: Angela Maria Monteiro Bettencourt (25 June 1951 â€“ 10 April 2021) was a Brazilian librarian. She was very important to the digitization of book collections. == Life == She graduated from the Federal University of the State of Rio de Janeiro, and Brazilian Institute of Information in Science and Technology (IBICT) . She was coordinator at the National Library of Brazil of the large digitization projects. == Works == * A hemeroteca digital brasileira == References == == Other websites == * Bettencourt, Angela M. title: Angela Bettencourt
